org.apache.ignite.hadoop

Interface HadoopMapReducePlan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface HadoopMapReducePlan
extends Serializable
    Map-reduce job execution plan.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<UUID> mapperNodeIds()
      Gets collection of all node IDs involved in map part of job execution.
      int mappers()
      Gets overall number of mappers for the job.
      Collection<HadoopInputSplit> mappers(UUID nodeId)
      Gets collection of file blocks for which mappers should be executed.
      UUID nodeForReducer(int reducer)
      Gets node ID for reducer.
      Collection<UUID> reducerNodeIds()
      Gets collection of all node IDs involved in reduce part of job execution.
      int reducers()
      Gets overall number of reducers for the job.
      int[] reducers(UUID nodeId)
      Gets reducer IDs that should be started on given node.

    • Method Detail

      • mappers

        @Nullable
Collection<HadoopInputSplit> mappers(UUID nodeId)
        Gets collection of file blocks for which mappers should be executed.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - Node ID to check.
        Returns:
        Collection of file blocks or null if no mappers should be executed on given node.

      • reducers

        @Nullable
int[] reducers(UUID nodeId)
        Gets reducer IDs that should be started on given node.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - Node ID to check.
        Returns:
        Array of reducer IDs.

      • mapperNodeIds

        Collection<UUID> mapperNodeIds()
        Gets collection of all node IDs involved in map part of job execution.
        Returns:
        Collection of node IDs.

      • reducerNodeIds

        Collection<UUID> reducerNodeIds()
        Gets collection of all node IDs involved in reduce part of job execution.
        Returns:
        Collection of node IDs.

      • mappers

        int mappers()
        Gets overall number of mappers for the job.
        Returns:
        Number of mappers.

      • reducers

        int reducers()
        Gets overall number of reducers for the job.
        Returns:
        Number of reducers.

        Gets node ID for reducer.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Node ID.
